title: Request Required Minimum Distribution (RMD)
description: A client of retirement age needs to take their annual RMD from their IRA.

tasks.description: Calculate the client's RMD for the year based on their age and prior year-end account balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the required distribution amount.

tasks.description: Discuss tax withholding options with the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the options, and the client elects to have federal taxes withheld.

tasks.description: Process the distribution from the client's IRA to their bank account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the withdrawal, less the specified tax withholding.
